Author: Message by

SendHeadingText: Choose how you want to send your message
SendToGeneralChannel: Send to the General channel of specific teams
SentToGeneralChannel: Sent to the General channel of the following teams
SendToRosters: Send in chat to members of the following teams
SentToRosters: Sent in chat to people in teams
SendToGroups: Send in chat to members of the group(s) you specify (for example: M365 group, distribution group, or security group)
SendToGroupsPlaceHolder: Type the name or email address of the group(s)
SendToGroupsNote: Note: The message will be sent to all members of the group(s) who have the Group Connect app added.
SendToGroupsPermissionNote: Permissions needed. Ask your IT admin to enable this option for you.
SentToGroups1: Sent in chat to members of the following groups
SentToGroups2: M365 groups, Distribution groups or Security groups
SendToAllUsersNote: Note: The message will be sent to all members of the group(s) who have the Group Connect app added.
UnauthorizedErrorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred while trying to access this service.
ForbiddenErrorMessage: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page. Please contact your administrator to be granted permission.
GeneralErrorMessage: Oops! An unexpected error seems to have occured. Why not try refreshing your page? Or you can contact your administrator if the problem persists.
ExportQueueSuccessMessage1: You'll be notified in chat when your file is ready to download.
ExportQueueSuccessMessage2: Note: You will first get a chat message asking you to give this app permission to upload to your OneDrive.
ExportErrorMessage: Try exporting the results again. If the problem persists, contact your IT admin for help.
TagLengthError: Tags cannot exceed 20 characters. Please revise.
SameTagExistsError: This tag has already been added
TagsCountError: A group can have a maximum of 3 tags
SemicolonTagError: Tags can't contain semicolons or comma. Please revise.
EmptyTagError: Looks like a space was added as a tag by accident. Select "X" to remove.
ResourceImageLinkPlaceholder: Enter public URL of an image of recommended size 550X350
TagInfo: Enable this setting to allow your group to appear in search results.
GroupAlreadyExists: An employee group already exists with the same link or name. If you want to create a new group, please try again.
TeamNotExists: We can't find a team associated with this link. Please try again.
CommunicationsTabOption: Add a Group Connect comms tab
DeleteHeaderText: Are you sure you want to delete this?
Title: Title
ConfigureTabMessage: Please click save to get started.
ForbiddenSubmitGroupErrorMessage: It looks like you don't have permission to create an employee group in this team. Ask the team owner to create it for you.
ProfileMatchingInfo: Allow the app to match you with people to meet in this employee group.
QnAFeatureText: Enable/Disable responses from the chat bot
ERGForTeamConfirmText: Enable/Disable the button for app users to register new groups
